caseTitle: Homoeo Dr.Asma Noreen Syed v. Government of Punjab thr. its Secretary Health, Primary & Secondary Healthcare Department, Lahore & others
tagline: (1) Discussion on Section 8 (5) of the Punjab Civil Servants Act 1974 as amended by Section 3 of the Punjab Civil Servants (Amendment) Act (Act III) of 2005. (2) Consideration for proforma promotion after retirement. (3) Actus curiae neminem gravabit- an act of the Court shall prejudice no one. (4) Justice should be imparted according to the law, notwithstanding whether the parties in a lis before the Court are misdirected and misplaced. (5) To perpetuate an error is no virtue but to correct it is a compulsion of judicial conscience.
